infobox.Japanese title:: 未確認衝撃事件  (Mikakunin Shōgeki Jiken)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Ran Mouri  Kogoro Mouri  Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi  Kazunobu Chiba  Officer Tome  Female forensics member  Unnamed officer
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Rikiya Koyama as Kogoro Mouri  Chafurin as Juzo Megure  Wataru Takagi as Wataru Takagi 
Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Kōsuke Toriumi as Masao Kaneda  Kōichi Sakaguchi as Tsuyoshi Nojima  Ryō Kamon as Naoki Murase  Naoki Tamanoi as Executive director  Tomokazu Yajima as Construction worker
infobox.Closing song:: Kimi no Egao ga Nani Yori mo Suki Datta

sections.Situation:
Kogoro, Ran, and Conan are walking down the street past several construction sites. One in particular used to be a bathhouse, and as they pass by, they hear a loud crash from the construction site.

The bands that held the pipe has marks suggesting that they had been deliberately cut, so this is not an accident, but a murder. The murderer would have to climb the stack to cut the bands to kill the victim, but other than the victim, none of the three workers approached the scene of the crime. Kaneda's knife is found at the scene, making him the prime suspect. Conan has his doubts, and investigates to find out how it is possible to cause this fake accident. He engages the culprit along with Kogoro's voice.
sections.People:
- Victim (crushed)
- 56 years old
- Owner
- 27 years old
- Yuuji's driver
- 36 years old
- Site supervisor
- 48 years old
- Architect
- "Fan Fan"'s curator
- Tokyo MPD CSI officer
sections.Resolution:
Murase had likely stolen the knife from Kaneda the previous day. He used that to make cuts on the inside of the bands, where they wouldn't be seen, and tied the bands slightly tighter than usual. He used a pitching machine from the "Fan Fan" building next to where the crime had been committed to shoot a ball at the steel bars, causing the bands to break and the pipes to fall down. This is how he caused the fake accident without being seen or risking getting crushed himself.
His shoes have red threads from Fan-Fan's carpet floor and his footprints were left on Fan-Fan's waxed floor, proving that he went there. After returning to the scene of the crime, he would have to dispose of the ball somewhere. It was found in the debris pile.
Murase admitted to loathing Inomata. Inomata had used cowardly methods to buy plots of land for cheap to build his chain of spa resorts: one of which was a bathhouse owned by Murase's family. His mother passed away from an illness, and his father committed suicide. But he hated Inomata for rejecting and insulting his design concept incorporating the bathhouse, and thereby insulting and destroying his father's memories.
